_meanings:
{@--4@} To
bring about, cause, produce, 
accomplish; {#upanayannarTAn#} <ls>Pt. 3. 180</ls>;  
{#upanayannaMgEranaMgotsavaM#} <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; <ls>K. 171.</ls>

{@--7@} To take
into one's possession, lead away,
lead; <ls>K. 169.</ls>

{@--9@} To hire, employ as hired
servants; {#karmakarAnupanayate#} <ls>Sk.</ls>

To cause (a master) to receive
(a pupil), cause to invest with
the sacred thread.
